mapper.select: select * from selected_trip_info where user_id = #{userId} and (start_date >= sysdate())

select distinct tp.id, tp.plan_name, tp.start_date, tp.end_date, tp.user_id, u.name as author from trip_plan tp inner join user u on tp.user_id = u.id inner join trip_plan_participate tpp on tp.id = tpp.plan_id where (tp.start_date >= sysdate()) and (tp.user_id = #{userId} or tpp.user_code = #{userCode}) and tp.id not in ( select id from selected_trip_info where user_id = #{userId} );
select count(*) from selected_trip where user_id = #{userId} and plan_id = #{planId}
select tp.id, tp.plan_name, tp.start_date, tp.end_date, tp.user_id, u.name as author from trip_plan tp inner join user u on tp.user_id = u.id where tp.id = #{planId};
select distinct day from trip_plan_places where plan_id = #{planId}
select u.email from trip_plan_participate tpp inner join user u on tpp.user_code = u.user_code where tpp.plan_id = #{planId};
select * from attraction_info where content_id in ( select content_id from trip_plan_places where plan_id = #{planId} and day = #{day} order by visit_sequence asc )
select tpp.id, tpp.user_id, tpp.plan_id, tpp.write_date, tpp.content, u.name as author from trip_plan_reply tpp inner join user u on tpp.user_id = u.id where tpp.plan_id = #{planId}
select tpp.id, tpp.user_id, tpp.plan_id, tpp.write_date, tpp.content, u.name as author from trip_plan_reply tpp inner join user u on tpp.user_id = u.id where tpp.id = #{replyId}
